name: Vlaamse Instelling voor Technologisch Onderzoek
goal:
VITO is an independent Flemish research organisation in the area of cleantech and sustainable development. Our goal? To accelerate the transition to a sustainable world.

VITO is a leading international research and consulting centre. Its research agenda focuses on today’s major social challenges: climate change, food security, raw materials scarcity, a sustainable energy supply and an ageing population. In this way, VITO supports not only the future vision of the EU and Flanders region, but also the United Nations Sustainable Development Goals.
interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, Business and Industry, Climate Action, Consumers, Digital economy and society, Economy, finance and the euro, Education and training, Energy, Environment, Public Health, Regional Policy, Research and innovation, Trade, Trans-European Networks, Transport, Youth
euInitiatives: VITO as a Research and Technology Organisation addressing global societal challenges seeks to increase its impact by responding to and influencing EU policies, as is illustrated in this and further sections, and particularly section 12 covering our participation in relevant partnerships/associations/committees/organisations.
